website_summaries.verdict: This set may be small, but it's packed with fun accessories that will stretch your child's imagination without stretching your budget.
pros: Cute accessories, brightly-colored graphics, and 2 ponies make this inexpensive play set attractive to kids
cons: The pieces are miniature sized, so it's not the best pick for kids under 3
The oak tree is a bit top-heavy

customer_reviews.title: anything that holds her attention for more than five minutes is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: As other users wrote, it is very small and a lot smaller than the photos make it appear. However, my God-daughter lost her mind when she got this for Christmas, and absolutely loves it. She played with it for over an hour the first time it was brought out, and continues to adore it. She is obsessed with My Little Pony, and at age four, anything that holds her attention for more than five minutes is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Stopitlaura

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the packaging this came in. Just a plain brown box, not the giftable box as shown in the pictures. This is a gift for my daughter’s friend and she won’t even know that it’s the “Spooky Library” when she opens it, just a plain box with no writing or color, you have no idea what’s inside and there is nothing to clue the birthday girl in on what she got. Just some weird house and two weird ponies.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butera

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves MLP and wanted this set. I'm glad I didn't pay full price. It's a shell of a building with tiny pieces. The owl and the telescope had to be super glued together and onto the tree in order to play with them. She likes it but it's not her favorite to play with. They should make this playset a full tree so it stands better and gives a better play experience. I would pay more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the two pony’s that come with it are a good size twilight sparkle and another one I haven’t seen ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old hasn’t stopped playing with it. She loves it. It comes with a few small pieces that I put away, but the two pony’s that come with it are a good size twilight sparkle and another one I haven’t seen before. It’s a good buy and you’re kid will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves My Little Pony, she has many different ones plus a large one that walks. She was very excited when she saw it. However it’s so small until it continually falls over, the accessories are super small. The tree itself should have been a full size instead of half a tree that falls over. Very disappointed in quality. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: infoplease

customer_reviews.title: Cute birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit mad looking in person - the mom of the 2 year old girl I got it for couldn’t tell what it was meant to be at first. ( a library in a tree for ponies, OBVIOUSLY). This seems to be what kids like... the 2 year old likes it (honestly it’s a little old for her but it’s what she wanted) but her 4 year old brother looooves playing with it too. Lots of pieces/parts which could drive you crazy but they seem to be enjoying it as much as anything else. Good for 3-5 years old I would guess.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but very small I should have ready the size specification. I based myself on the pictures . My little one is not very interested because is too small but it’s very cute
customer_reviews.author: SKA

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: They will enjoy it for a time but your better off with a big dollhouse not this. As you will throw it away after a while and it’s not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Daughter liked it for her bday
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this as one of her 6th bday gifts. It is a little smaller than I expected but she still plays with it. Rating it 4 stars bc of it being so small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MamaM

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old niece as a birthday gift who is obsessed with My Little Pony. She was so excited to open it and was fixated on opening this gift first. The set is much smaller than I expected and the ponies are plastic and have no hair on them.
customer_reviews.author: Janellemp

customer_reviews.title: La Pièce de Résistance!
customer_reviews.text: So happy I got this! I had purchased some of the MLP Nightmare Night collection previously so I just needed this piece to make it complete! I love the whimsical look of the treehouse/library. Keeps very much the feel of the show. The back shows the interior of the library so your ponies can hang-out inside too. Love that it comes with Zecora! The entire look of the treehouse and figurines with costumes is pretty much bang-on with the Nightmare Night episode. Very cool piece!
customer_reviews.author: Screamingbaker

customer_reviews.title: Small in size
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as photo makes it .. :( huge disappointment! She hasn't played with it yet bc it's a birthday gift but not happy on size ..
customer_reviews.author: Paul hull

customer_reviews.title: Its okay-
customer_reviews.text: I think I expected a tad more out if it. It's pretty small....to where when the pony's are in their dress up gear they don't fit properly in some of the cubbies in the tree. My daughter didn't seem to notice while we played together with it so I guess as long as she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chicoodee

customer_reviews.title: Great valve and appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Everything in package made this value purchase loved by niece. Sturdy and colorful!!!

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: It is a really cute play set and we have had lots of fun playing with this one together
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves this! I would have given it 5 stars but the front door does not fit right and will not stay on at all. It is a really cute play set and we have had lots of fun playing with this one together.

customer_reviews.title: WAY overpriced- unless you get it for less than $10!
customer_reviews.text: SOOOOOO overpriced. Meant for the smaller ponies (blind bad size) which is great. Front of the tree looks great. The back is just a shell without much thought put into it- which that is the side the kids play in. Molded plastic and not very deep. Very disappointing. Would return but it was a Christmas gift. Also surprised this is an Amazon Choice toy- but I am not really sure what that means anyway!

product_meta.title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic Collection Spooky Golden Oak Library Playset – Play with Twilight Sparkle and Zecora In This Super Fun, Magical Toy - Perfect for Kids Ages 3+ - 11 Piece Collection
product_meta.description:
Ponyville is getting ready for a frightful night of fun and spooky times for their Nightmare Night. This Golden Oak Library playset is decorated just in time for Nightmare Night as it comes with spooky moss, 2 pony figures, 1 owl pet figure (Owlowiscious, the beloved owl pet of Twilight Sparkle), 2 outfits, and 5 accessories. The Twilight Sparkle figure has a mystical wizard look which includes a beard, hat, and dress decorated with stars and moons. The Zecora figure has hair decorated with spooky spiders and comes with a scary fun black dress accessory! Your child can dress the Zecora and Twilight Sparkle pony figures in their spooky-fun outfits and play out fun scenes for their Nightmare Night adventures!

BRAND STORY
By My Little Pony
feature_bullets: COLLECTIBLE FRIENDSHIP IS MAGIC PLAYSET - your child can dress Ponyville miniatures Twilight Sparkle and Zecora in Nightmare Night costumes and discover magical secrets in the golden oak library
11 PIECE PLAYSET - includes one plastic oaken library tree, 2 spooky and fashionable pony figures, 2 cool removable outfits, a pretend owl figure and 5 accessories. Pony figures stand 2 inches tall
STORYTELLING & PLAY - spark imagination and play out fun scenes with the accessories from the MLP Friendship Is Magic Collection. Put Twilight in her outfit and help Zecora peer through the telescope
DESIGNED FOR AGES 3+ - choking hazard due to small parts. Not for children under 3 years. Adult supervision is advised
A PERFECT GIFT IDEA - My Little Pony fans would agree it's a great present. Expand your My Little Pony empire, discover hidden secrets in the oaken library and learn about magic from ancient texts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars262 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
